_meta.source: Researched from Royal Caribbean, CruiseCritic, and guest reviews

bbox_hint.note: Royal Caribbean's private peninsula on Haiti's north coast

transit_routes.name: Direct Dock
transit_routes.note: Ships dock directly at Labadee pier. No tender needed.

transit_routes.name: Beach Area Shuttle
transit_routes.note: Shuttle runs between beaches. Walking also easy on paths.

featured_experiences.name: Dragon's Breath Flight Line
featured_experiences.note: 2,600 feet of thrilling zipline. Additional fee. Book ahead.

featured_experiences.name: Dragon's Tail Coaster
featured_experiences.note: Caribbean's first alpine coaster. Gravity-powered sled.

featured_experiences.name: Beach Relaxation
featured_experiences.note: Food and basic activities included. Calm waters, beautiful scenery.
